price: Zã su yi rantsuwa da Allah a gare ku idan kun jũya zuwa gare su, dõmin ku kau da kai daga gare su. To, ku kau da kai daga gare su don kõ sũ ƙarantã ne, kuma Jahannama ce matattararsu bisa ga sãkamakon abin da suka kasance sunã tsirfatãwa.
arabic: سَيَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبۡتُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لِتُعۡرِضُواْ عَنۡهُمۡۖ فَأَعۡرِضُواْ عَنۡهُمۡۖ إِنَّهُمۡ رِجۡسٞۖ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
